info.author: Sveinbjorn Thordarson
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
# iceweather

Python wrapper to look up Icelandic Met Office weather observations, forecasts, etc. Wrapper for the apis.is weather JSON API.

## Installation

```
$ pip install iceweather
```

## Examples

## Version History

0.1.1 - Fall back on other close weather stations for if err in result from closest station 
0.1 - Initial release (10/09/2019)
